channel.title: How do i connect to server?
channel.description: yea, how do i connect to servers, i don't understand how, can some one pleas tell me??

item.title: How do i connect to server?
item.dc:creator: @mopar_I mopar I
item.description:
@mopar_I wrote:

To connect to servers get on moparscape. Get the server info such as the ip,port and if it uses hamachi.

Example:

Username: [User Name]
Password: [Password to access user]
Server IP: [Server Name]

For port go to the top left corner: File–> New Port. Put in the port there.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i connect to server?
